channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Wp-Hide
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Wp-Hide

item.title: CVE-2022-3489|2024-08-03T01:14:01.546Z -- unknown -- wp-hide
item.description: The WP Hide WordPress plugin through 0.0.2 does not have authorisation and CSRF checks in place when updating the custom_wpadmin_slug settings, allowing unauthenticated attackers to update it with a crafted request
